entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Web adapter API to convert between ASP.NET Core and System.Web types #51119
  • Opaque redirect handler results in message "Error: 405 Method Not Allowed" in Blazor app #51118
  • Blazor: Page scroll is incorrectly reset after a page refresh #51112
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51111
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51110
  • Consolidate Blazor Web App terminology: "Interactive render mode" vs "Interactivity type" vs "hosting model" #51108
  • IIS hosting. AspNetCoreModuleV2. NullReferenceException when SignalR socket disconnected #51105
  • Failed integrity metadata check for Blazor application (NET7) #51104
  • Add [RenderModeStatic] attribute #51102
  • When Calling Methods From JS To DotNet #51100
  • .NET 8 RC1 Controller chooses different JsonConverter compared to .NET 6/7 #51098
  • [Blazor Server] Missing Event Callback Parameters Does Not Throw Errors. #51097
  • WebAssembly.DevServer (The SSL connection could not be established) #51093
  • Session cookie ITicketStore & ISecureDataFormat #51092
  • Invalidating ModelMetadata #51091
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51090

Closed

  • Support Windows NamedPipe's in Kestrel #14207
    8.0-rc2
  • Form post failed to bind to Uri property in Blazor web app #51072
    8.0.0
  • Full stack web UI with Blazor #46636
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.2.23451.1] SPOTClient reported Telerik.UI.for.Blazor package error on the login page. #50525
    8.0.0
  • rc1 tag cross build failed for ppc64le #50679
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: single_query #51089
  • RC1 Blazor Web App NavMenu Has Double Icons When Importing Bootstrap Icons Script In Head #50737
    8.0.0
  • Quarantine `ServerErrorNotificationTest.ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Dismiss` and `ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Reload` #50377
    8.0.0
  • Building ASP.NET Core from source fails with an error (MissingMethodException System.Text.Json.JsonDocument System.Text.Json.JsonDocument.Parse) #50479
  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #50960
  • Blazor WebAssembly Template Project Structure Is Inconsistent With Blazor Web App Template In .NET 8 RC1 #51103
  • IISUrlRewrite: {HTTP_HOST} contains port number #9713
    9.0-preview1
  • H #51099
  • BlazorWeb, require button names to have a matching code-behind variable. #51081
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51074
  • HubProtocolVersionTests.ClientUsingOldCallWithNewProtocol is flaky #48733
  • Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project #51003

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51117
    area-signalr, feature-client-net
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #51116
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #51115
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Use token expiration value from options as fallback #51113
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Re-structure Blazor Project Templates #51107
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • refactor addedToDom #51095
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Selenium updates. #51087
    area-infrastructure
  • Rename metrics tag exception.type to error.type #51084
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2282521 #51109
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK. #51086
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Form data mapping] Support for mapping URIs from form data #51019
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2282521 #50997
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Add SERVER_NAME variable to IISUrlRewrite #51020
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Test-fixed reactions #51079
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Rename bootstrap icons that are used in templates #51060
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
